name: 黃昭勳
objective:
1. 水泥比重試驗 (Density Test of Hydraulic Cement)
2. 水泥標準稠度試驗 (Water Ratio Test for Normal Consistency of Hydraulic Cement Paste)
3. 水泥砂漿流度試驗 + 水泥砂漿抗壓試體製作 (Flow Test of Hydraulic Cement Mortar + Compressive Strength Test of Hydraulic Cement Mortars - Part 1)
4. 混凝土坍度試驗、混凝土圓柱及矩形梁試體製作 (Slump Test of Hydraulic-Cement Concrete + Making and Curing of Concrete Test Specimens in the Laboratory )
5. 粗粒料比重及吸水率試驗 (Density, Relative Density, and Absorption Test of Coarse Aggregate)
6. 細粒料比重及吸水率試驗 (Density, Relative Density, and Absorption Test of Fine Aggregate)
7. 粒料篩分析試驗 (Sieve Analysis of Fine and Coarse Aggregates)
8. 混凝土圓柱劈裂抗張強度試驗 (Splitting Tensile Strength Test of Cylindrical Concrete Specimens)
9. 鋼筋拉伸試驗 (Tension Test of Reinforcing Steel Bars)
10. 粒料容積密度及空隙率試驗 (Bulk Density and Void Test in Aggregate)
11. 粗粒料洛杉磯磨損試驗 (Degradation Resistance Test of Coarse Aggregate by the Los Angeles Machine)
12. 混凝土抗彎強度試驗 (Flexural Strength Test of Concrete)
13. 非破壞性檢測 (Non Destructive Testing, NDT)
